title: IModuleAlarming (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE IModuleAlarming EXTENDS __System.IQueryInterface
Interface used to make a module function block to be callable after
an alarm was issued. Implement this interface in your module function block
in order to get a callable module function block, which can get module calls
after an alarm was issued.
Methods:
ConsumeModuleAlarm
Structure:
ConsumeModuleAlarm (Method)
